content: Morning Rohan. Your consolidated diagnostic report is ready. Here's the secure link: [secure-link]. Executive summary: 1) ApoB elevated at 110 mg/dL, 2) Vitamin D low, 3) VO‚ÇÇ Max top 20% for age, 4) DEXA shows slight left/right leg imbalance.
Got it, Warren. Thanks for keeping it concise. Will go through details later today.
Rohan, your low Vitamin D is common for execs spending a lot of time indoors. I recommend starting 4000 IU daily D3/K2 - helps immunity & mood. Looping Ruby to arrange delivery.
On it Carlaüëç Rohan, I'll have the D3/K2 shipped to your home today. ETA tomorrow.
Perfect. Thanks bothüôè
Rohan, VO‚ÇÇ max is a strong predictor of longevity. You're already top 20% for your age. Excellent base. Goal for next 3 months: nudge into top 5% with structured intervals.
Love it. Let's push that metric hard.
From the DEXA: body fat 22%, bone density solid. Small muscle imbalance between legs. I'll add single-leg work in the new program to even that out and boost stability.
Makes sense. Looking forward to seeing the new plan.
Warren - given my family history + ApoB 110, should I be thinking statin now?

Valid concern. My approach: lifestyle-first for 3 months ‚Äî aggressive diet & training. Then we re-test ApoB. If it's still high, we can have an informed med discussion. Evidence shows this path works for many in your profile.
Clear. Let's run the 3-month experiment.
Quick recap: team's reviewed your report, Vit D supplement en route, insights now feeding into your 1st integrated plan. Target delivery: next week.
Appreciate the tight loop Ruby.
Morning Rohan. Quick hydration reminder. How's adherence been the past 2 days?
Better. 2/2 mornings so far. Still skipping the evening breathing sometimes.
Noted. I'll have Sarah ping you at 9:30pm as a gentle nudge.
Your Vit D arrived yet? Want you starting ASAP so we can recheck in 8 weeks.
Yes, came this afternoon. Starting tonight.
Leg imbalance drills uploaded to Trainerize. Just 6-8 mins, 3x/week. Add before your regular workout.
Saw them. Doable.
Noticed yesterday's Garmin sync dropped ‚Äî want me to troubleshoot with Sarah?
Yes please. Didn't realise it was offline.
Sarah's on it now. Should be backfeeding data by noon.
Garmin data back online. Your HRV's trending up 5% over baseline. Small win.
Nice to see early movement.
Flying to Jakarta on Fri? Want me to prep your travel pack & hotel gym options?
Yes, and confirm the supplement pack is in there.
Noted. You'll have all travel gear + supps ready by Sun night.
Sent you a quick breakfast tweak for travel days - higher protein to keep hunger stable. Check your inbox.
Got it. will test in Jakarta.
How were the single-leg drills this week? Any soreness?
First session left me with mild soreness left side only.
That's expected. It means the right muscles are firing. Keep at it.
Morning Rohan ‚Äî just wanted to say great progress on the engagement front. The more we collaborate, the faster we'll hit those targets.
Agreed. Feeling well-supported. Thanks team!
